changeSet.author: lkovacic

preConditions.sqlCheck:
SELECT count(*) FROM workbench_tool WHERE (name = 'breeding_view_wb' AND path = '/ibpworkbench/workbenchtools/breeding_view' AND tool_type = 'WEB' AND version = '17.1') OR (name = 'breeding_gxe' AND path = '/ibpworkbench/workbenchtools/breeding_gxe' AND tool_type = 'WEB' AND version = '17.1') OR (name = 'manage_program' AND path = '/ibpworkbench/workbenchtools/manage_program' AND tool_type = 'WEB' AND version = '17.1') OR
(name = 'germplasm_import' AND path = '/ibpworkbench/bm/germplasm-import/' AND version = '17.1') OR (name = 'bm_list_manager_main' AND path = '/ibpworkbench/bm/list-manager' AND version = '17.1') OR (name = 'study_manager_fieldbook_web' AND path = '/Fieldbook/TrialManager' AND version = '17.1') OR (name = 'study_browser' AND path = '/ibpworkbench/maingpsb/study/' AND version = '17.1') OR (name = 'dataset_importer' AND path = '/Fieldbook/etl/' AND version = '17.1') OR (name = 'inventory_manager' AND path = '/inventory-manager/#/' AND version = '17.1') OR (name = 'germplasm_mainheadtohead' AND path = '/ibpworkbench/maingpsb/Head_to_head_comparison' AND version = '17.1') OR (name = 'trait_donor_query' AND path = '/ibpworkbench/maingpsb/Trait_Donors_Query' AND version = '17.1') OR (name = 'gdms' AND path = '/GDMS/main/' AND version = '17.1') OR (name = 'ontology_manager' AND path = '/ibpworkbench/controller/ontology' AND version = '17.1');
